scopes.messages: to post and delete messages on a user's behalf
scopes.feed_likes: to like and unlike feed on a users behalf
scopes.follower_list: to read the list of followers and followed-by users
scopes.groups: to create and delete groups on a user's behalf
scopes.relationships: to follow and unfollow accounts on a users behalf
scopes.reports: to report account, feed, group and comment on a users behalf
scopes.group_invitations: to create, delete, accept and reject invitations on a user's behalf
scopes.media: to create and delete media on a users behalf
scopes.comment_likes: to like and unlike comment on a users behalf
scopes.basic: to read a users profile info and media
scopes.friend_requests: to create and delete friend request on a users behalf
scopes.feeds: to post and delete feeds on a users behalf
scopes.comments: to post and delete comments on a users behalf
